alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 13 at 4:27AM AKST until December 15 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...LONG DURATION HEAVY SNOW EVENT FOR THE HAINES AND KLONDIKE HIGHWAYS WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY NIGHT... .A wave of moisture moving through the northern panhandle will bring moderate to heavy snow for the Haines and Klondike Highways. A period of snow is likely near sea level for Haines and Skagway beginning late Wednesday night and lasting through Thursday morning. ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches possible for the towns of Haines and Skagway increasing to up to 24 inches along the Haines Highway and Klondike Highway. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway and Haines, including the Haines and Klondike Highways. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and is discouraged. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of snow is likely for the towns of Haines and Skagway before a changeover to rain near sea level is anticipated by late Thursday morning or early Thursday afternoon. Snow will continue along the Haines and Klondike Highways for the duration of the event. The greatest snow totals will be along the Highways.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
